reporting-org.narrative: AVT-L Association of Victims of Terrorism Lebanon

title.narrative: Advocacy campaign to raise awareness of the youth on the plight of victims of terrorism and the impact of violent extremism.

description.narrative: Awareness-raising campaigns in Lebanon's regions most vulnerable to inter-community tensions, poverty and the risk of radicalization. The third session will encourage young people to engage in prevention activities with younger pupils.
El Mouassat school at Saida: 5 Meetings – 63 students

participating-org.narrative: AVT-L - Association Libanaise des victimes du terrorisme

activity-date.narrative: Second session closed at Al Mouassat.
Second session of the awareness activity started at Saida with 63 students from Al Mouassat college.
